feed.title: Bitcoin at POS using BIP70, NFC and offline payments - implementer feedback

entry.title: Bitcoin at POS using BIP70, NFC and offline payments - implementer feedback
entry.summary: It seems that the speaker is currently making modifications to BitPay's memo field. The reason for this modification is to avoid a failure report from Andreas' wallet when transmitting the original via Bluetooth. It is not entirely clear what the context of this situation is or why the speaker is communicating it.
